title: How long does it take to write 40,000 words? - Quora

response.answer_text: This really depends on the topic, if you are writing a story or an essay when you consider the research involved it will probably be a few months or even years. If it’s like just repeatedly typing the same word or a very long diary entry then you could probably do it in a few weeks. It would definitely depend more on the topic and thinking involved than it would on the physical typing speed.

It depends on your writing speed. I can write 3000 words daily so I can write around 40,000 words in less than two weeks. You can split the number of words you are able to do easily in a day and then determine how long will it take you to get to 40,000.
